description.value:
Trigger An enemy in your kinetic aura damages you.

Lava reflexively explodes underneath you and the creature that hurt you. The triggering enemy takes @Damage[(floor((max(6,@actor.level)-6)/4)+1)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] up to half your Speed in any direction; this movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Level (+4) The damage increases by 1d6.
